ygData.subject: RE: Thread was closed
ygData.msgSnippet: Bumping is the only way to get their attention.  This has been proven by positive feedback from Abashi.  The ONLY reason we even got a full issue of the
ygData.messageBody:
Bumping is the only way to get their attention. This has been proven by
positive feedback from Abashi. The ONLY reason we even got a full issue of
the Arch-Magi Column devoted to Bards was due to a post I made that was
bumped over 400 times. Verant lives by the squeaky wheel philosophy it
seems...

Rokenn
